name: electrobun
description: Build ultra fast, tiny, and cross-platform desktop apps with Typescript.
author: Blackboard Technologies Inc.

scripts.build:cli: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/electrobun
scripts.dev:playground: bun install && bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd ../playground && bun install && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.dev:playground:clean: cd ../playground && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf vendors/cef && cd ../package && bun dev:playground
scripts.dev:playground:canary: bun install && bun build:release && cd ../playground && bun install && bun build:canary && bun start:canary
scripts.run:playground: bun install && bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd ../templates/interactive-playground && bun install && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.push:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:patch: npm version prepatch --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:minor: npm version preminor --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:major: npm version premajor --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:stable: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.test: bun install && bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd ../tests && bun install && bun build:dev && bun start
